data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Zhi-Teng, Du, Yu-Zhou (2016): A new species of Neoperla (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Zhejiang Province of China. Zootaxa 4093 (4): 589-594, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4093.4.12
